ABOUTPAGE.INTRO_TEAM: We are a group of students at the SEDC academy. This project is our effort to dive into the secrets companies may keep.
ABOUTPAGE.INTRO_ABOUT: There are very few ways of finding out how it's like to actually work at a company. We aim to rectify that problem by providing a platform where users can share their stories, anonymously.

MY_ACCOUNT.COMPANY_REVIEWED_NOT: Notify me when a company is reviewed
MY_ACCOUNT.COMPANY_ADD_NOT: Notify me when a company is added

TERMS_OF_SERVICE.TITLE: General Terms of Service
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.COOKIE_BODY: We do not store cookies on our page.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.HATE_SPEECH_BODY: Hate speech of any kind will not be tolerated.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.REVIEWS_BODY: Users need to have a verified account to post a review.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.ANON_BODY: We will not share or expose your email address, and we do not show usernames at all.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.RESERVED_1: We reserve the right to remove reviews that violate rule 2.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.RESERVED_2: Serious offenders can have their accounts banned.

TOASTR.UNVERIFIED: You must verify your account before continuing!
TOASTR.LINKEDIN: You need to input your linkedin account!
TOASTR.MATCHING: Password and confirmed password need to match!
TOASTR.FILL_PASSWORD: You need to fill out both password fields!

CONFIRM_DIALOG.RESET_Q: Are you sure you wish to reset your password?
